00026 #include <FdoStd.h>
00027 #include <Fdo/Connections/IConnection.h>
00028 #include <Fdo/Commands/ICommand.h>
00029 #include <Fdo/Commands/DataStore/IDataStoreReader.h>
00030 
00031 /// \brief
00032 /// The FdoIListDataStores interface defines the list datastores command,
00033 /// which provides a way to get a list of datastores at a particular server. 
00034 class FdoIListDataStores : public FdoICommand
00035 {
00036 friend class FdoIConnection;
00037 
00038 public:
00039     
00040     /// \brief
00041     /// Gets the flag that indicates whether to include or
00042     /// not include Non-FDO enabled datastores in the returned list.
00043     /// These are also referred to as foreign datastores.
00044     /// 
00045     /// \return
00046     /// Returns the flag
00047     /// 
00048     FDO_API virtual bool GetIncludeNonFdoEnabledDatastores() = 0;
00049 
00050     /// \brief
00051     /// Sets the flag to indicate whether to include or not include
00052     /// Non-FDO enabled datastores in the returned list. These are also
00053     /// referred to as foreign datastores.
00054     /// 
00055     /// \return
00056     /// Returns nothing
00057     /// 
00058     FDO_API virtual void SetIncludeNonFdoEnabledDatastores(bool include) = 0;
00059 
00060     /// \brief
00061     /// Executes the FdoIListDataStores command.
00062     /// 
00063     /// \return
00064     /// Returns nothing
00065     /// 
00066     FDO_API virtual FdoIDataStoreReader* Execute() = 0;
00067 };
00068 
00069 #endif
